document_data.mainbody:
mberfire was a strong whiskey brewed in the town of Three Swords, located near the Landrise on the Traders Way between Eartheart and Channathgate, circa the Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR.
Amberfire had a fiery taste and was a popular import to Kh√¥ltar where the local brewers added their own proprietary ingredients that they claimed made for a higher quality, more palatable, beverage.
